channel.title: VPS,What is it?
channel.description:
Title says it all,how do u get it,what does it mean,does it cost,does it improve preformance?...
THANKS!!!!

item.title: VPS,What is it?
item.dc:creator: @my_pker my pker
item.description:
@my_pker wrote:

VPS = virtual private server

Basically you pay a sum of money from about $3 and higher a month to run it.

What you do is you access the VPS manually via remote desktop connection & run your server on it to keep it on 24/7

The more file size your VPS can hold, the less laggy it will be and the more players you can hold on your server E.G. 512mb VPS can hold 60 people quite easily.

I personally have a 3 GB Dedi server that i get about $6 a month and that can hold about 500+ players easily.

(I hope this helped, feel free to REP++ me)

Read full topic
